Text:
Yay!!! Finally!!
This isn't a dig at the uploader as I realize it was only done broadcating in the last hour maybe. It's a dig at the Discovery Channel for doing all it could to kill this show (1st ep last August, 2nd October, 3rd now - mid April 2011.)
Well this is a dig at the uploader - it says "no rar" and this is a rar.
You don't know how to read a full sentence do you?

his point is still valid. you promote a place win an advantage listed as NO RARS (multipart rars are so dumb), yet you do this as one.

multipart rars are an annoying holdover from an earlier era. there is no good reason for them today.
